attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Determine what data transformation tools are needed for CSV processing.

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Use construct_tool to create a 'parse_csv' tool with implementation_strategy='code_generation'. Provide a JavaScript function that parses CSV and returns JSON. Include proper error handling.

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Now use the parse_csv tool you just created to process the input data.
